overview: SauAcker depicts the obstacles faced by Philipp, a young farmer determined to modernize his father's  old-fashioned farm. His motto is "I'll do it my way". Philipp is fully committed and is even risking his  relationship to attain his goals. The documentary paints a funny and charming picture of the two wayward  heroes and presents an entertaining angle on the realities of contemporary society.
title: Sauacker
